  • Method Details

    • createEdition

      public void createEdition(int editionsYear, int numberPlayers, int numberTrials, ArrayList<String> list)
      Parameters:
      editionsYear - number of a year (int)
      numberPlayers - number of players (between 1 and 5) (int)
      numberTrials - number of trials (between 3 and 12) (int).
      list - ArrayList of type String

    • editionListInfo

      public List<String> editionListInfo()
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of each year of each edition (String).

    • isCoincident

      public boolean isCoincident(int editionsYear)
      Parameters:
      editionsYear - year of an edition (int).
      Returns:
      true (the year received by parameter is equal to a year of an existing edition), or false (if not).

    • getYearEditionInfo

      public List<String> getYearEditionInfo(int index, TrialManager trialManager)
      Parameters:
      index - is a specific position in an ArrayList (int).
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of type String.

    • duplicateEdition

      public void duplicateEdition(int i, int editionsYear, int numberPlayers)
      Parameters:
      i - is a specific position in an ArrayList (int).
      editionsYear - year of an edition (int).
      numberPlayers - number of players (int).

    • deleteEdition

      public boolean deleteEdition(int index, int year)
      Parameters:
      index - is a specific position in an Edition type List (int).
      year - is a specific year used to check if there's this existing year in an edition (int).
      Returns:
      true (if the trial was deleted), or false (if not).

    • dependentTrial

      public boolean dependentTrial(String trialsName)
      Parameters:
      trialsName - a name of a trial (String).
      Returns:
      true (if exist a dependency between an edition and a trial), or false (if not).
